data.title: BBC America with David Attenborough - Frozen Planet an Arctic documentary
data.text:
bs kite

Online

    

: On

p.1 #1 · p.1 #1 · BBC America with David Attenborough - Frozen Planet an Arctic documentary

Just a heads up.

Tonight, this 4 season series is airing in the northeastern U.S.

The polar bear footage is as intimate as it gets and the storyline is absolutely fascinating.

Most will agree - nobody does nature better than Sir David Attenborough's BBC team.

As a bonus, there's another related documentary airing tonight, titled The Polar Bear Family and Me.

Robert

Edited on Mar 17, 2019 at 01:52 AM · View previous versions

morris

Offline

      

: On

p.1 #2 · p.1 #2 · BBC America with David Attenborough - Frozen Planet an Arctic documentary

Hi Robert,

Do you mean:

PLANET EARTH: FROZEN PLANET TV-PG

SEASON 1  EPISODE 1

The Ends of the Earth

David Attenborough travels to the end of the Earth, taking viewers on an extraordinary journey across the polar regions of our planet, North and South. The Arctic and Antarctic are the greatest and least known wildernesses of all.
